physical_appearance: "The image shows a photograph in black-and-white. It has a black frame and its border is white in colour. A man in uniforms can be seen standing on the left platform of the locomotive. He seems to be looking and pointing at something that is 45 degrees from his point of view. The centre of the photograph is taken up by the head of a locomotive. It is stationed at a railway turntable. The number ""6423"" is displayed at the front of the locomotive.
